set.name: HON
set.longname: Custom cards set of Flame-chasers in Honkai Impact 3rd

card.name: Aponia the Discipline
card.text: Flying, vigilance When Aponia the Discipline enters, starting with you, each player apply one effect until this card leaves the battlefield. • All other creatures you control gains indestructible and hexproof. Skip all your battle steps. • All your creatures gains trample and double-strike. Skip all your draw steps. • You may cast spells from your hand as though they had flash. Skip all your main steps.

card.name: Cosmic Juggernaut
card.text: Menace, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may roll the planar die. When Cosmic Juggernaut attacks, target creature phases out. Crew {4}

card.name: Doctor MEI
card.text: Vanishing 4 You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast a Human or artifact spell from the top of your library once per turn. If you cast a spell this way this turn, that spell cost {1} less to cast. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Search your library for a Human or artifact card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Eden the Gold
card.text: When Eden the Gold enters the battlefield, each player creates a colorless 1/1 Music Note creature token with 'when this creature leaves the battlefield, if there are no other Music Note tokens on the battlefield, each other player sacrifices a land'. Eden's power and toughness each equal the number of Music Note tokens on the battlefield.

card.name: Elysia the Ego
card.text: Reach {X},{T}, Choose a creature type: Create an X/X colorless artifact creature token with the chosen type.

card.name: Elysian Realm
card.text: If a creature you control would leave the battlefield, you may exile it instead with a memory counter on it. {1}, {T}: Create a token that is a copy of target creature in exile with a memory counter on it, except it has Defender and is an Illusion in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Griseo the Star
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, create a 0/X Canvas creature token, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell. This ability triggers only once each turn. {3}, {T} : Target Canvas creature becomes a copy of another target creature, except it’s a Painting creature and it’s toughness is X, where X is the toughness of the canvas creature.

card.name: Honkai Zombification
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a goaded 3/3 colorless Beast creature token.

card.name: Hua the Vicissitude
card.text: First-strike If Hua the Vicissitude would leave the battlefield, exile it instead with 3 time counters on it, if she doesn't have suspend she gain suspend.

card.name: Kalpas the Decimation
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your combat phase, create a 0/1 colorless Ash artifact creature token. Whenever Kalpas the Decimation destroys a creature in combat, each player sacrifices a permanent and discards a card.

card.name: Kevin the Deliverance
card.text: Vigilance, trample, Indestructible Whenever Kevin the Deliverance enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Human creature card, reveal it, put it in your hand, then shuffle. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target creature.

card.name: Kosma the Daybreak
card.text: Haste, provoke Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Kosma would die this turn, exile it instead. Kosma has all abilities of creatures exiled this way.

card.name: Mobius the Infinity
card.text: Persist, infect 1,T, Exile a non-Human creature card from any graveyard : Target Human creature gains the exiled card's abilities in addition to its own.

card.name: Pardofelis the Reverie
card.text: Reach {T}, Exile the top card of target opponent’s library: Each opponent bid mana. You start the bidding with a bid of {0}. The player who bids the most may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost. Create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the highest bid.

card.name: Treasure
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Project ARK
card.text: Flying Crew 2 When Project ARK deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. You may play an additional land each turn.

card.name: Quantic Transcendence
card.text: When Quantic Transcendence enter the battlefield, put a leaf counter on each other non-land permanent you control. When a permanent with a leaf counter leaves the battlefield, return it to the battlefield under its owners control.

card.name: Sakura the Setsuna
card.text: Double strike Bushido 1 At the end of your post-combat main phase, if Sakura the Setsuna dealt damage to a player, tap up to one target creature that player control, put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Su the Bodhi
card.text: All players may cast spells as though they had Assist. Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Vill-V the Helix
card.text: Madness 3R As long as Vill-V the Helix is on the battlefield, each artifact is an artifact creature with base power and toughness each equal to its mana value or 1/1, whichever is greater, and is goaded.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Bloodstained Mire
card.text: T, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Chromatic Lantern
card.text: Lands you control have '{T}: Add one mana of any color.' {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: City of Brass
card.text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Command Tower
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Flooded Strand
card.text: T, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Forbidden Orchard
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever you tap Forbidden Orchard for mana, target opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Indatha Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add W, B, or G.) Indatha Triome enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ketria Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.) Ketria Triome enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.text: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Polluted Delta
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Polluted Delta: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Raugrin Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.) Raugrin Triome enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Savai Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.) Savai Triome enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Scalding Tarn
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add CC.

card.name: Wooded Foothills
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Zagoth Triome
card.text: ({T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.) Zagoth Triome enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: 7 Thunders of Retribution
Parallel Lives
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: Fractured Identity
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

card.name: Spara's Headquarters
card.text: ({T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.) Spara's Headquarters enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Raffine's Tower
card.text: ({T}: Add {W, {U}, or {B}.) Raffine's Tower enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Xander's Lounge
card.text: ({T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.) Xander's Lounge enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Ziatora's Proving Ground
card.text: ({T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.) Ziatora's Proving Ground enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Jetmir's Garden
card.text: ({T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.) Jetmir's Garden enters the battlefield tapped. Cycling 3 (3, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Arid Mesa
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Misty Rainforest
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Windswept Heath
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Marsh Flats
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Project STIGMA
Fenghuang Down
card.text: Suspend 3 {-} {b} {t}: Take a card from target opponent library and put it in their hand, then they do the same for you. Exile ~ with three time counters on it.

card.name: Oath of Judah
card.text: {4}, {t} : Until next turn, target player must pay twice as much mana to cast spells.

card.name: Sea of Quanta
card.text: Sea of Quanta enters the battlefield tapped. {X}, {T}: Add X plus one mana of any one color. X can't be greater than 3.

card.name: The Great Hibernation
card.text: When The Great Hibernation enters, all creatures become a 0/1 Cryonized Creature until The Great Hibernation leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Unnamed Satellite
card.text: {2}, {T}: Create a colorless Waste basic land token. {1}, {T}: Transform target Waste basic land you control into a basic land of your choice.

card.name: Judgment Of Shamash
card.text: Equipped creature gets +5/+0 and has trample. Whenever equipped creature attacks, it deals 5 damage to each creature blocking it. At the beginning of your next end step, destroy equipped creature. Equip 3RR

card.name: Star of Eden
card.text: {t}, Choose one : - When a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn. - When a creature attacks, it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: White Flower
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, create a 1/1 colorless Human creature token. When 3 token have been created by White Flower, transform it. Equip {2}{w}

card.name: Black Abyss
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has wither 2. Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may destroy target creature. If a creature would leave the battlefield due to an ability of Black Abyss, exile it instead. Equip {2}{b}

card.name: Xuanyuan Sword
card.text: Shroud When ~ enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that is a copy of ~. {t}: Sacrifice ~, add one mana of any color.

card.name: Jizo Mitama
card.text: When Jizo Mitama enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature. Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has bushido 1 and haste. You control equipped creature. Equip {2}{r}

card.name: Klein
card.text: Artifacts you control have hexproof. {g}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Prometheus
card.text: {T}, Exile Prometheus: You control target player during their next upkeep. During that turn, you may cast spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Himeko
card.text: At your unkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on target Human creature.

card.name: Avacyn's Collar
The Prydwen, Steel Flagship
card.text: Flying Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Human Knight creature token with "This creature gets +2/+2 as long as an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn." Crew 2

card.name: Urza's Incubator
card.text: As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Grand Abolisher
card.text: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.

card.name: Careful Cultivation
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+3 and has reach and "{T}: Add {G}{G}." Channel — {1}{G}, Discard Careful Cultivation: Create a 1/1 green Human Monk creature token with "{T}: Add {G}."

card.name: Leonin Abunas
card.text: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Herald's Horn
card.text: As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.name: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
card.text: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

card.name: Arcade Gannon
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Put a quest counter on Arcade Gannon. For Auld Lang Syne — Once during each of your turns, you may cast an artifact or Human spell from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of quest counters on Arcade Gannon.

card.name: Boromir, Gondor's Hope
card.text: Whenever Boromir, Gondor's Hope enters the battlefield or attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Human or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Paladin Danse, Steel Maverick
card.text: Vigilance, lifelink Exile Paladin Danse, Steel Maverick: Each creature you control that's an artifact or Human gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Painsmith
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Rita Rossweisse
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a Human creature or Artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a cleaning counter on this card. {T}, Remove three cleaning counters from this card: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Druid of Purification
card.text: When Druid of Purification enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player may choose an artifact or enchantment you don't control. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

card.name: Heronblade Elite
card.text: Vigilance Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Heronblade Elite. {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is Heronblade Elite's power.

card.name: Hostage Taker
card.text: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile another target creature or artifact until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Ana Schariac, Snow Lotus Leader
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, exile Ana Schariac with three time counters on it. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. When you cast this card from exile, its effect become “When this card enters, put an indestructible counter on target creature.”

card.name: Jirina Kudro
card.text: When Jirina Kudro enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game. Other Humans you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Knight of the White Orchid
card.text: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Nephalia Smuggler
card.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Library of Leng
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

card.name: Narset, Enlightened Exile
card.text: Creatures you control have prowess. Whenever Narset, Enlightened Exile attacks, exile target noncreature, nonland card with mana value less than Narset's power from a graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Fatespinner
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player chooses draw step, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen step or phase this turn.

card.name: Kynaios and Tiro of Meletis
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Each player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield, then each opponent who didn't draws a card.

card.name: Cloudshift
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Deadly Rollick
card.text: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Exile target creature.

card.name: Deflecting Swat
card.text: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. You may choose new targets for target spell or ability.

card.name: Mana Drain
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

card.name: Momentary Blink
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
